sourceMeaningMnemonic: All the <radical>rice paddies</radical> are <radical>jammed in</radical>to the <kanji>world</kanji>.
meaningInfo: The world is basically just a bunch of rice paddies smooshed together, if you think about it.
readingMnemonic: To get around this <kanji>world</kanji> of rice paddies, you need to use a <reading>kay</reading>ak (<ja>かい</ja>).
readingInfo: A rice paddy is mostly made up of water, just like our world, and you don't want to have wet feet. Use the power of your kayak to become a world traveler.
